name: Rain
description: A heavy downpour. You are soaking wet. Thereâ€™s deep puddles and it feels like this will grow into a raging storm any second.
effect:
- All Water-Type moves gain 1 base damage.
- All Fire-Type moves get their total damage reduced by 1.
- Moves that become Complete Heal with Sunny weather will only restore 1 HP instead.
- Reduce the number of successes you need to heal a Burn Status Condition by 3.
